night_enabled:
Night mode enabled!
It will turn off at %s
make_admin: Bot installed. Make me an admin to manage night mode. Use /lang RU to switch lang
admin_now: Now I am an admin. Configure the night mode. /info
admin_remeber: Make me an admin to use the commands.
not_allowed: Only admins and the group owner can use this command.
info_command: Current group time (GMT%s): %s Night mode set from %s to %s Scheduler: %s : %s Commands: /enable, /disable, /info, /set, /tz, /lang, , /bot
